data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Teacher: Carl, did you finish your homework last night?
Carl: I ____ tried ____, ____ the ____ were ____ hard.
Teacher: You ____ to ____ your ____. If ____ don't ____ your ____, ____ will ____ the ____.
Carl: I ____. But I don't like doing it at all.
data.partBlankContent:
Teacher: Carl, did you finish your homework last night?
Carl: I rea___ tried t_, b__ the prob____ were t__ hard.
Teacher: You ha__ to d_ your be__. If y__ don't d_ your home____, y__ will fa__ the cl___.
Carl: I kn__. But I don't like doing it at all.
data.answer:
老师:卡尔，你昨晚做完作业了吗?
卡尔:我真的尽力了，但是问题太难了。
老师:你必须尽力。如果你不做作业，你这门课就会不及格。
卡尔:我知道。但是我一点也不喜欢这样做。
